fullText:
Fast Manifestation

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Genasi, Extra Manifestation
Benefit: Once per day you can change your elemental manifestation as a minor action. If you have already used an encounter power associated with your elemental manifestation, you can still use the encounter power associated with your newly changed elemental manifestation.

Published in Dragon Magazine 367, page(s) 14.
name: Fast Manifestation
benefit: Once per day you can change your elemental manifestation as a minor action. If you have already used an encounter power associated with your elemental manifestation, you can still use the encounter power associated with your newly changed elemental manifestation.
